message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand that $120 might be a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
I'm willing to make another compromise, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $102.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $99 for the product.
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
